sen.j: また、慶応2年（1866年）9月12日 (旧暦)に起きた三条制札事件の際には三番組に属し報償として金千疋を受け取り、慶応3年（1867年）12月7日 (旧暦)の天満屋事件が起きた際には原田左之助隊に属し斎藤一、大石鍬次郎らと共に紀州藩公用人三浦安らの護衛にあたる。
sen.e: When the Sanjo-ohashi Bridge Noticeboard Incident occurred on October 20, 1866 (表記の変更), he received a financial incentive in gold equivalent to 2.5-ryo in old currency, belonging to Sanbangumi-tai (third platoon), and in the Tenmanya Incident on January 1, 1868 (表記の変更), he took charge of guarding an official of Kishu Domain, Yasushi MIURA, with Hajime SAITO, Kuwajiro OISHI and others, as a member of the platoon lead by Sanosuke HARADA.

sen.j: 慶応3年（1867年）の幕臣御取立ての儀に際して平士として見廻組並御雇の格を受ける。
sen.e: In 1867, when the ceremony of promotion to Shogun's retainer was held, he was conferred the status of Mimawarigumi Namioyatoi (junior member of the Shogunate patrol) (見廻組並御雇), although he was still a member with no title.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争では会津戦争が緒戦、明治2年（1869年）5月1日、白河口の戦いにおいて重傷を負うも、土方歳三に従い蝦夷へ渡航。
sen.e: During a series of the Boshin Civil War, his fought for the first time in the Aizu War, and although he was injured seriously in the battle of Shirakawaguchi on June 10, 1869 (表記の変更), he went over to Ezo (present Hokkaido), following Toshizo HIJIKATA.

sen.j: 池田屋事件を経験し、なおかつ戊辰戦争において箱館まで転戦した新選組隊士は、土方歳三を別とすれば島田魁と尾関雅次郎、そしてこの蟻通勘吾の3名だけであり、有る意味稀有な存在である。
sen.e: Among the members of Shinsengumi, those who lived the experience of the Ikedaya Incident and later went down to Hakodate surviving various fights during the Boshin Civil War were reduced to only three; Kai SHIMADA, Masajiro OZEKI and this Kango ARIDOSHI, except for Toshizo HIJIKATA, and in this sense, he was an rare person.

sen.e: It should be noted that he stayed at the lowest rank for his entire career, although he was one of the oldest members from the outset of Shinsengumi.
